FuncDef: The display ip-pool max-ratio domain command displays information about IP address pool usage in all domains on the device.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After an address pool is bound to a domain, IP addresses in the address pool are assigned to users in the domain for login and released upon user logout. To check IP address pool usage in all domains and determine whether bound address pools need to be adjusted, run the display ip-pool max-ratio domain command to check the current and historical maximum IP address pool usage.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
